name: Platform game mariano
description:
The game is platform style, consists of running and jumping through obstacles and enemies, the goal of the game is to gather the rings that give score, there are also other items such as the one that gives you extra life, or that gives you invulnerability .

Game controls: Cursor keys to move or run in the direction you want, space key to jump, s key to save game, L key to load game, and escape key to exit the game
